lexUnit.name: bark.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: utter (a command or question) abruptly or aggressively

sentence.text: ` Not for long anyway , " Miss Trunchbull barked , grinning .
` You ! " she barked , pointing at a small boy called Rupert in the front row .
` Nobody is allowed up here , " he barked , irritated at their intrusion .
` How dare you disobey orders ! " he barked .
` Shut up , Doreen , " Silas barked , his face contorted by a scowl .
Maxwell 's broad grin was instantly replaced with a dark scowl as he barked : ` Things have changed around here since your days ! "
` Quiet , the pair of you ! " barked Joshua .
" Doa n't hit'er ! " barked Mr Dakin .
` Well , " barked de Raimes , turning on the man , ` come in , fool !
` Give us credit for some sense ! " barked Iris , who had been showing signs of impatience .
At last he rose and barked an order at one of the young men who placed the ladder lying on the ground against the scaffold , then gestured dramatically at Athelstan .
The portiere barked some instructions at the boy and made Sandison to understand that Aldo would see to it that the letter got posted .
Inside the crowded control room Eling was standing by the intercom , barking instructions , eyes fixed on the dials and gauges as he listened to replies .
Nevertheless , the fellow began to bark orders .
As he disappeared what was left of Eling 's crew came to attention as the captain barked the final order .
Sometimes , no matter how hard you brandished your fist , no matter how loudly you barked a protest , the world continued on its way without even noticing that you were there .
` Control yourself , you silly witch , " he barked at her .
` Come on , do n't just stand there , give me a hand , " she barked at the shop assistant .
` Serves the miserable Hun right , " the customer barked from underneath the towels .
The PT instructor barks out his orders with an enthusiasm that is unnatural for this time of the morning .
When he had completed it , he barked out an order to his hovering secretary : ` Find Romanov . "
She barked out a little laugh .
Was he about to bark out a reprimand ? she wondered .
